replies.body:
Well, if nothing else - that was fast.  

It'll be interesting to see how close you are when we see him properly! :D

(I really like the vine-like background you've got going on there.  It's got a bit of William Morris in it.)
Those are some WOW level oversized pauldrons.
I think it will more closely resemble the one on the left being that in the video it looks like he has a huge cape or some type of hunchback
I wanna see the actual champ ;/
OK, we can see that the hype train is still strong.
